title: june 7: a papal state
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about how Vatican City became an independent state. After, she reflects on a recent release from Sonic Youth. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
